Field Summary
 const bool ALTERNATE_METAPH
          flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the alternate encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.
 const bool APPROXIMATE
          flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the approximate keys to be used.
 const int CUTOFF_SCORE
          Constant representing the largest Levenshtein Distance score that a returned word can have from the initial search string and still be included in the processed version of the results.
 const int DEFAULT_MAX_KEY_LENGTH
          Default maximum length of encoded key.
 const bool EXACT
          flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the "exact" keys to be used.
 const bool GET_DEFINITIONS
          flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list
 const bool MAIN_METAPH
          flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the primary encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.
 const int MAX_KEY_ALLOCATION
          Default size of key storage allocation
 const bool NO_DEFINITIONS
          flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you do NOT want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list
 const bool PHONETIC
          flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same SOUND as the initial search string
 const bool SPELLING_ONLY
          flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same LETTER as the initial search string
 

Field Detail

ALTERNATE_METAPH

 const bool ALTERNATE_METAPH;
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the alternate encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.

APPROXIMATE

 const bool APPROXIMATE;
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the approximate keys to be used. This encoding is the one used in previous versions of Metaphone that maps all voiced/unvoiced pairs to the same encoding

CUTOFF_SCORE

 const int CUTOFF_SCORE;
Constant representing the largest Levenshtein Distance score that a returned word can have from the initial search string and still be included in the processed version of the results.

DEFAULT_MAX_KEY_LENGTH

 const int DEFAULT_MAX_KEY_LENGTH;
Default maximum length of encoded key.

EXACT

 const bool EXACT;
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the "exact" keys to be used. This includes both the "exact" setting of Metaphone3 that does NOT map all voiced/unvoiced pairs to the same encoding, that is, the distinctions are maintained, as well as the setting that causes non-initial vowels to be encoded

GET_DEFINITIONS

 const bool GET_DEFINITIONS;
flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list

MAIN_METAPH

 const bool MAIN_METAPH;
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the primary encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.

MAX_KEY_ALLOCATION

 const int MAX_KEY_ALLOCATION;
Default size of key storage allocation

NO_DEFINITIONS

 const bool NO_DEFINITIONS;
flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you do NOT want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list

PHONETIC

 const bool PHONETIC;
flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same SOUND as the initial search string

SPELLING_ONLY

 const bool SPELLING_ONLY;
flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same LETTER as the initial search string
